name: Suicide SpaceSheep 2
description:
You are a sheep lost in space, going on a last suicidal mission to fight mad rockets with anchors crafted from bananas.⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

The game

Each banana gives you 3 energy, while shooting and dashing cost you 1 each. Every 5s, a new wave of rockets shows up.
Have fun on your last journey!

The prequel

Yes, there is a prequel to this game ... here. It was one of my first games, made in Java with the Greenfoot environment. I wanted to see how fast I could recreate it with the new engine I use, Godot, but I ended up playing with animations, particles and sound effects. Hope you enjoy!

Credits

Background art : Space backgrounds by TheDarkBear
Musics : "A bit of ChipTune" by Magic_Spark
